TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Reusable Lookup to fetch Revenue category as well as Matrix Description for a Infinium GL Code
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: LKP_MATCH_MATRIXCODEMASTER

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT A.MATRIX_DESC as MATRIX_DESC, A.REVENUE_CTGRY as REVENUE_CTGRY, A.MATRIX_CD as MATRIX_CD FROM $$STG_SCHEMA.S_MST_MATRIXCODEMASTER A WHERE A.CURRENT_FLAG='$$RECORD_ACTV_FLG'

MAPPING.DESCRIPTION: This Mapping will load all the contract reward or autocharge data to CPPH_HIST table for all the Month to Month Contract data.
MAPPING.NAME: m_STG_TO_HOPM_S_TXN_CPPH_HIST_LOAD_MONTHLY_REWARD

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This Expression transformation populates the common columns as well as does the transformations required for the records flowing in from the S_TXN_CONTRACT_REWARD_OR_AUTO to the S_TXN_CPPH_HIST for Month to Month contract data.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_S_TXN_CONTRACT_REWARD_OR_AUTO

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: IIF(ISNULL(i_LDR_CHLNG_CD) , IIF(NOT ISNULL(i_CHLNG_RATE),'C', IIF(NOT ISNULL(i_LDR_RATE),'L','C')), i_LDR_CHLNG_CD)
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: v_LDR_CHLNG_CD

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: DECODE(1, v_LDR_CHLNG_CD = 'L' AND NOT ISNULL(i_LDR_RATE),i_LDR_RATE , (ISNULL(i_LDR_RATE) OR v_LDR_CHLNG_CD = 'C') AND NOT ISNULL(i_CHLNG_RATE), i_CHLNG_RATE, i_AMOUNT )
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: o_CPPH_MONTHLY_FV

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This Expression transformation populates the INFINIUM_GL_CODE for the Matric code lookup
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_CONTRACT_REWARD_OR_AUTO

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This transformation is used to filter data whose CPPH_MONTHLY_CHARGE OR CPPH_MONTHLY_FV is 0
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: FIL_CHARGES_FV

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This has a SQL oevrride for fetching the records from Staging Table Contract Reward or Auto Charge that need to be loaded to Contract Product part Hopper for the Month to Month contract data.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: SQ_SC_S_TXN_CONTRACT_REWARD_OR_AUTO

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CPPH_HIST_CPPH_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, A.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY, A.REWARD_OR_AUTO_CHARGE_ID, A.AMOUNT, C.PROF_MAP_CD, A.DPI_ENVIRONMENT, C.TARIF_CD, C.SVC_TYPE, C.PRD_CD, A.ACTIVITY_FLAG, F.CYCLE_BEGIN, F.CYCLE_END, E.BILLING_CYCLE, A.EFFECTIVE_DATE , A.FIRST_BILL_DATE, F.BILL_DATE, A.INFINIUM_GL_CODE, A.PRD_CATLG_KEY, A.USI, A.RECCURING_FLAG, D.END_DATE, A.ITEM_SEQUENCE_NUMBER, C.CORE_PRD, G.LDR_CHLNG_CD, C.LDR_RATE, C.CHLNG_RATE FROM (SELECT DISTINCT BILL.BILLING_CYCLE,BILL.ENVIRONMENT,BILL.CYCLE_BEGIN,BILL.CYCLE_END,BILL.BILL_DATE FROM $$STG_SCHEMA.S_PROCESSED_BILLING_CYCLE BILL WHERE BILL.ETL_CYCLE_ID= $$ETL_CYCLE_ID) F INNER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CUSTOMER E ON E.BILLING_CYCLE=F.BILLING_CYCLE AND E.CURRENT_FLAG = '$$RECORD_ACTV_FLG' INNER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CONTRACT D ON D.DPI_CUSTOMER_KEY = E.DPI_CUSTOMER_KEY --AND F.ENVIRONMENT=D.DPI_ENVIRONMENT AND D.CURRENT_FLAG = '$$RECORD_ACTV_FLG' AND D.END_DATE < F.BILL_DATE INNER JOIN (SELECT AUTO.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY, AUTO.REWARD_OR_AUTO_CHARGE_ID, AUTO.AMOUNT,AUTO.ACTIVITY_FLAG,AUTO.EFFECTIVE_DATE , AUTO.FIRST_BILL_DATE,AUTO.INFINIUM_GL_CODE, AUTO.PRD_CATLG_KEY, AUTO.USI, AUTO.RECCURING_FLAG, AUTO.ITEM_SEQUENCE_NUMBER,AUTO.DPI_ENVIRONMENT,AUTO.WIRE_CENTER FROM $$STG_SCHEMA.S_TXN_CONTRACT_REWARD_OR_AUTO AUTO WHERE AUTO.CURRENT_FLAG = '$$RECORD_ACTV_FLG' AND AUTO.ACTIVITY_FLAG <> 'O' AND AUTO.RECCURING_FLAG = '$$RECORD_ACTV_FLG' AND AUTO.ETL_CYCLE_ID <> $$ETL_CYCLE_ID AND AUTO.ETL_CYCLE_ID > 0 )A ON A.DPI_ENVIRONMENT = F.ENVIRONMENT AND A.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY = D.DPI_CONTRACT_KEY INNER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_MST_PRD_CATLG C ON A.PRD_CATLG_KEY = C.PRD_CATLG_KEY AND F.BILL_DATE BETWEEN C.EFFEC_STRT_DATE AND C.EFFEC_END_DATE LEFT OUTER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_REF_WRCTR G ON A.WIRE_CENTER = G.WRCTR_NO AND G.CURRENT_FLAG ='$$RECORD_ACTV_FLG'

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This target is populated with Contract Assembly information coming in from all the Contract Map tables in Staging Layer
INSTANCE.NAME: SC_S_TXN_CPPH_HIST

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Pre SQL

INSTANCE.NAME: EXP_CONTRACT_REWARD_OR_AUTO

INSTANCE.NAME: SC_S_TXN_CONTRACT_REWARD_OR_AUTO

MAPPINGVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Stores the Current ETL Cycle Id
MAPPINGVARIABLE.NAME: $$ETL_CYCLE_ID

MAPPINGVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Stores the value for the Active Flag for the Current_Flag
MAPPINGVARIABLE.NAME: $$RECORD_ACTV_FLG

MAPPINGVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Stores the schema name for the Staging Tables
MAPPINGVARIABLE.NAME: $$STG_SCHEMA

MAPPINGVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Stores the ETL Cycle User Id
MAPPINGVARIABLE.NAME: $$ETL_LOAD_USER

MAPPINGVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Stores the schema name for the Hopper Mirror Tables
MAPPINGVARIABLE.NAME: $$RHOP_SCHEMA

MAPPINGVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Constant value for PROFILE_MAP_CODE for tax lines
MAPPINGVARIABLE.NAME: $$TAX_PROFILE_MAP_CODE

SHORTCUT.COMMENTS: Source Defintion for Staging Table for Contract Reward or Auto
SHORTCUT.NAME: SC_S_TXN_CONTRACT_REWARD_OR_AUTO

SHORTCUT.COMMENTS: Target Defintion for Hopper Mirror Table for Contract Product Part Hopper
SHORTCUT.NAME: SC_S_TXN_CPPH_HIST
